edu.nyu.pqs.stopwatch.impl

Class Stopwatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.pqs.stopwatch.impl.Stopwatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStopwatch

    public class Stopwatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStopwatch
    The Stopwatch is a thread-safe factory class implements IStopwatch objects. It includes all stopwatch's methods for getID of the stopwatch, start,stop, lap and reset stopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stopwatch(java.lang.String id)
      This is the constructor of Stopwatch

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the Id of this stopwatch
      java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getLapTimes()
      Returns a list of lap times (in milliseconds).
      void lap()
      Stores the time elapsed since the last time lap() was called or since start() was called if this is the first lap.
      void reset()
      Resets the stopwatch.
      void start()
      Starts the stopwatch if the stopwatch never run before.
      void stop()
      Stops the stopwatch (and records one final lap).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stopwatch

        public Stopwatch(java.lang.String id)
        This is the constructor of Stopwatch
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the stopwatch

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the Id of this stopwatch
        Specified by:
        getId in interface IStopwatch
        Returns:
        the Id of this stopwatch. Will never be empty or null.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the stopwatch if the stopwatch never run before. Continue the stopwatch if the stopwatch has been stoped
        Specified by:
        start in interface IStopwatch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called when the stopwatch is already running

      • lap

        public void lap()
        Stores the time elapsed since the last time lap() was called or since start() was called if this is the first lap.
        Specified by:
        lap in interface IStopwatch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called when the stopwatch isn't running

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the stopwatch (and records one final lap).
        Specified by:
        stop in interface IStopwatch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called when the stopwatch isn't running

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the stopwatch. If the stopwatch is running, this method stops the watch and resets it. This also clears all recorded laps.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface IStopwatch

      • getLapTimes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getLapTimes()
        Returns a list of lap times (in milliseconds). This method can be called at any time and will not throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        getLapTimes in interface IStopwatch
        Returns:
        a list of recorded lap times or an empty list if no times are recorded.
